title: PHPHOOLIGANS
description: Presentation format using provocative statements about development to spark an open discussion with the audience.
slogan: Everybody knows code but the PHPHOOLIGANS know better!

title: Playing Minecraft
description: For relaxation, I play Minecraft on the Xbox. Survival mode "hard", no cheats. I do everything in one world with the seed "Potherca" (839716126).
slogan: Streamed on Twitch for your entertainment

title: Badges for Project Stages
description: A collection of badges for project stages, to be used in project README files to indicate the current stage of the project.

title: XML Diff
description: This web application will tell you the difference between two given XML files, regardless of node order. It also takes node attributes into account.

title: Favicon Generator Cloudflare Worker
description: A Cloudflare Worker that generates SVGs that can be used as favicons for my experiments.

title: Pipeline Components
description: Small and fast, constantly updated containers for Gitlab, GitHub and other CI/CD pipelines.
slogan: More than 10 million pulls on Docker Hub!

title: Gunk
slogan: In a burrow at the bottom of the garden, underneath a pile of, rubbish lives Gunk. These are stories about her.

title: Parrots
description: Simple web service that outputs what it has been given as input with a prefix added.

title:
PaDePoPeS
Package Dependency Popularity Per-Searchterm
description: When given a searchterm, it will return a count of dependencies for the found packages, sorted by popularity
slogan: Want to know which Packagist dependencies are most popular for a certain term?

title: PHP TimeCop Example
description: Examples demonstrating how PHP TimeCop works

title: Blinds
description: Chrome plugin to hide unwanted pins on Pinterest based on one or more provided words.

title: Liquid Linter CLI
description: Wrapper for the NodeJS liquid-linter package, allowing it to be run from the command-line interface (CLI).

title: "Hello world" cross-reference
description: Comparison of all 'hello world' examples across various sources.

title: Find Typos on GitHub
description: Finding typos in the most popular github repositories made easy.
slogan: Fill in your faborite typing mistake (typo) in the field below and press the buttin!
